features: 24 FAMILY MEGA ROLLS: Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper with Active CleaningRipples Texture, 1-Ply, 24 Family Mega Rolls (4 packs of 6); 388 sheets per roll.
TOILET PAPER WITH CLEANINGRIPPLES TEXTURE: Cottonelle Ultra Clean toilet tissue removes residue that can cause irritation, removes odor-causing bacteria, and is designed for sensitive skin.
GENTLE SUSTAINABLE TOILET PAPER: Soft, premium 1-ply toilet paper is septic-safe and 3x stronger** to keep your hands protected and clean as you wipe.
TOILET TISSUE FOR A HEALTHY CLEAN: Use Cottonelle toilet paper and Cottonelle flushable wet wipes together for a refreshing, shower fresh clean.

FSC-CERTIFIED TOILET PAPER: Cottonelle is FSC certified ensuring we source from responsibility managed forests to prevent deforestation and only uses fibers that are 100% plant-based and free of harsh chemicals.
body.description: Get the superior clean you’ve been waiting for with Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper, designed to clean three ways in one. The soft, yet strong cleaning ripples are safe for sensitive skin and removes residue that can cause irritation and odor-causing bacteria. The Cadillac of 1-ply toilet paper, Cottonelle Ultra Clean toilet tissue is 3x stronger than the leading value brand in order protect your hands as you cleanup, and is still septic-safe and clog-free. Each Cottonelle Family Mega Roll has 388 sheets per roll so you can worry less about running out when you or guests at your home need it most. Looking for more ways to feel clean down there after taking care of business? Use Cottonelle flushable wet wipes to feel shower fresh 3x longer***. Conveniently remain stocked on toilet paper by ordering Cottonelle for delivery to your door or pickup curbside. Cottonelle cares about you and our planet. We are proud to be FSC certified ensuring the forests we source from are responsibly managed to prevent deforestation and help protect the trees and animals that depend on them. We also use fibers that are 100% plant-based and no harsh chemicals or dyes.*vs. leading value brand regular rolls **vs. leading value brand ***using dry + wet vs dry alone.

Why Cottonelle? No matter how you roll, Cottonelle’s sustainable, premium toilet paper and flushable wipes help you feel ahhh-mazing—our soft and strong bathroom essentials meet strict standards to protect forests and the animals and people that depend on them. What’s the difference between Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper and Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper? Our Ultra Clean toilet tissue is designed to remove more residue* to help you feel confidently clean. Our Ultra Comfort toilet tissue is designed to absorb more moisture* to help you feel comfortably clean. *vs. leading value brand What’s CleaningRipples Texture? Those little ripples are designed to help you clean the best so you can feel your best! They hold shape when wet, which means removing more residue* (Ultra Clean) and absorbing more moisture* (Ultra Comfort) with every wipe. *vs. leading value brand What’s a Mega Roll? It’s mega-amazing: Each Mega Roll lasts 4x longer than the leading brand’s regular roll, so you don’t have to change rolls as often. How many square feet are in Cottonelle Toilet Paper? Cottonelle is designed with you in mind, and that means tons of different sizes to help you find the perfect roll. Giant + Roll: 30.60 square feet per roll. Mega Roll: 32.90 square feet per roll. Family Mega Roll: 40.90 square feet per roll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Cleanliness Redefined: Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper
reviews.reviewText: I have been receiving Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper on auto-delivery, and it's one of the best decisions I've made for my household needs. Here’s why I’m completely sold on this product:Exceptional Texture and Efficiency: The Active CleaningRipples texture is the standout feature for me. It offers an excellent balance of softness and strength, ensuring comfortable use without compromising on effectiveness. The texture really aids in better cleaning, which makes a noticeable difference.Strength and Durability: Each sheet is strong and durable, meaning I use less paper per visit. This not only makes it cost-effective but also environmentally considerate. It’s reassuring to know that even though it’s strong, it's still gentle on the skin.Mega Roll Size: The Family Mega Rolls are a fantastic value. Each roll lasts significantly longer than regular rolls, reducing the frequency of changing rolls. This is particularly convenient for busy households or larger families.Softness: The softness of this toilet paper is remarkable. It’s gentle on the skin, making it suitable for all members of my family, including those with sensitive skin.Sheet Quantity: With 388 sheets per roll, the quantity provided is generous. This, coupled with the quality and effectiveness of each sheet, makes it an excellent investment.Auto Delivery Convenience: Having this toilet paper on auto-delivery means I never have to worry about running out. It’s a seamless and convenient service that ensures I’m always stocked up.Overall Satisfaction: Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper has changed my view on what high-quality bathroom tissue should be. It's an outstanding product that offers comfort, efficiency, and value. Highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their bathroom experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Tail of Comfort: My Cottonelle Chronicles!
reviews.reviewText: Once upon a time, in the faraway kingdom of my bathroom, there emerged a hero clad in white, embossed with delicate patterns, and softer than a whisper - the Cottonelle Bathroom Tissue!Epic Softness: This isn't just toilet paper; it's like a gentle cloud from the heavens, specifically designed for your royal behind. Each sheet is like a soft hug from a cuddly kitten, but without the fur.Strength of a Thousand Sheets: It's so strong, I half expected it to have a black belt in tissue-fu! I mean, this stuff could probably hold up in a light breeze, yet it’s tender on the tush. A paradox? Perhaps. A miracle? Absolutely!Mystical Absorbency: It’s like each square is a mini, highly-trained, absorbency ninja. Spills and splashes fear it, and rightly so. It’s as if it whispers, “Bring it on, life, I’ve got this!”Roll Endurance: These rolls last longer than my motivation to work out. It's like they have a secret life supply hidden within each layer. Marathon rolls for a sprint price!Aesthetic Majesty: Let’s not forget, it’s pretty enough to be a part of your bathroom decor. If bathroom tissue can be considered art, Cottonelle is the Picasso of the loo.In conclusion, if you wish to treat your derriere to a regal experience, look no further than Cottonelle. It’s not just bathroom tissue; it’s a lifestyle choice for your posterior’s happiness.Remember, in the game of thrones (bathroom edition), you either win or... well, let’s just say with Cottonelle, you’re always winning!

reviews.reviewText: We love this toilet paper. It’s inexpensive and strong. Great for my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toilet roll. It is very soft and gentle. I recommend it so much that I have started taking laxatives so I can use it even more.

reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s a decent price and not too think or thin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There's NO competition
reviews.reviewText: (What, am I gonna put a video of me using the product? LOL)Anyway. Look. I've been using Cottonelle Ultra Clean in all iterations of its name for a very, very long time. We've tried all the toilet papers, using cheap when that's all we could afford and then using Cottonelle when that's what we knew we were worth.Forget Angel Soft and Charmin; they don't do their duty unless you wad it up a hundred million times. Is Scott TP even mentionable? I hate even bringing it into a discussion where Cottonelle is its "opponent." That's like saying Cottonelle is eating a King's feast on the throne (heh), and Scott is dumbly licking the floor. Please. Quilted Northern is pretty good, if it's all you can find instead of Cottonelle. I wouldn't be heartbroken to have to buy it if the store was out of my favorite and I had to get QN, but I swear those "cleaning ripples" on Cottonelle really do make all the difference in the world as far as functionality, and the quilting, as my experience has shown me, in QN is a detriment to its function.Bottom line: we're team Cottonelle All. The. Way. ... And your toilet paper should be hanging under.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Change is good
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched completely from Charmin to this brand. I find it have the same qualities, except for softness. I definitely use less so it's a cost saver.

I love the quality both soft and strong.happy with price best of all the convenience of online purchase and next day delivery. The rolls are supersized so one order lasts a very long time.There is no worry of running out with the next day delivery offered with prime. Never thought I would be an online shopping convert.
No sabia que ya habían sacado este papel, estoy feliz. buena calidad y resistenteLo recomiendo ampliamente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Not worth the poor paper quality
reviews.reviewText: Opted for this product due to the positive reviews and reasonable-ish price. Regretted it within days as the quality is subpar, with paper dust/lint falling off the rolls and ending up in nooks & crevasses where they don't belong.That being said, there's certainly a lot of it. They're tightly packed with narrow rolls of cardboard to maximise the quantity in the same volume. Just a pity it didn't live up to similar alternatives like Cusheen Splesh brand.
Too expensive to buy this way. It just lasts a little longer but is not the same as 5 rolls stated on the advert.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Year’s Supply for a Single Person
reviews.reviewText: I have found the quantity of rolls as a single person are sufficient for an entire year without the need to repurchase in the interim. The rolls are sizeable and the fibre of the paper is strong, and its texture is smooth.I highly recommend this product!
